titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 250th anniversary of the Hartford Courant newspaper.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
9/17/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 250th anniversary of the Hartford Courant and the positive impact of such newspaper throughout U.S. history.
Acknowledges the importance of a vibrant free press to democracy.
